Up.Statement: IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM w2_MasterExportSetting WHERE master_kbn = 'UserPointDetail' AND setting_id = '001' ) BEGIN INSERT INTO w2_MasterExportSetting ( shop_id, master_kbn, setting_id, setting_name, fields, del_flg, date_created, date_changed, last_changed, export_file_type ) values ( '0', 'UserPointDetail', '001', 'ユーザーポイント情報(詳細)', 'user_id,name,point_type,point,point_exp,kbn1', 0, GETDATE(), GETDATE(), 'ｗ２ユーザー', 'CSV' ) END
